/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vista.
